item.title: Vim Command Workflow
item.description: In this tutorial, I’ll share my Vim command workflow and give you some guidelines about how to move and edit text in Vim efficiently.

item.title: Vim Basic Commands
item.description: In this tutorial, you’ll learn the basic commands in Normal, Command-line and Insert mode that you need to know to work in Vim efficiently.
